attributes.title: Mastering the Four Fundamental Forces
attributes.description:
1 DECEMBER 2019 - POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG. 

*TODAY IS SUCH AN AUSPICIOUS DAY AND ENERGY. TODAY IS THE BEGINNING OF THE GRAND CELEBRATION - NITHYANANDESHWARA BRAHMOTSAVAM - CELEBRATING PARAMASHIVA FOR 17 DAYS. 

*DEFINITION OF BLISS IS WAKING UP EARLY MORNING AND DOING PUJA! 

*MOST BEAUTIFUL IMPORTANT SACRED SECRET: CONSCIOUSLY YOU DECLARING ‘PARAMASHIVOHAM’ - “I AM PARAMASHIVA” -  IS MUCH MORE POWERFUL THAN ALL THE 4 FORCES - GRAVITY, ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE, STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE AND WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE. YOUR CONSCIOUS DECLARATION IS SO POWERFUL, IT WILL MANIFEST IN SUCH A WAY THAT THESE 4 FORCES ARE LOWER THAN YOU, AND YOU ARE SUPREME, ULTIMATE THAN THESE 4 FORCES. 

*IT IS POSSIBLE! YOU NEED TO ONLY UNDERSTAND: 
-GRAVITY’S INTERNAL IMPACT ON YOUR SYSTEM IS LAZINESS IN THE BRAIN. -ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE’S INTERNAL IMPACT ON YOUR SYSTEM IS SELF DOUBT IN YOU. 
-WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE’S INTERNAL IMPACT ON YOUR SYSTEM IS SELF HATRED IN YOU. 
-STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE’S INTERNAL IMPACT ON YOUR SYSTEM IS SELF DENIAL. 

*DECLARE THE TRUTH ‘NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVOHAM’ TO THE LEVEL WHERE YOUR LAZINESS, YOUR SELF DOUBT, SELF HATRED, SELF DENIAL ARE DESTROYED. “YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA” IS NOT THE TRUTH BECAUSE IT HAS A UTILITY VALUE, IT IS THE TRUTH BECAUSE IT IS THE TRUTH! EVEN IF YOU ARE FACING THE WORST FEARS OF YOUR LIFE, UNDERSTAND, YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA! 

*THE GREATEST SERVICE YOU CAN DO TO ME IF YOU ARE FEELING GRATEFUL TO ME FOR SUPPORTING YOUR LIFE IN ANY WAY, THIS IS THE GURU DAKSHINA I WANT: “DECLARE YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA TODAY!” IT IS MORE POWERFUL THAN YOUR LAZINESS, SELF DOUBT, SELF HATRED, SELF DENIAL. YOU DON’T NEED TO CONQUER THE EXTERNAL OBJECTS TO BE SUCCESSFUL. IF YOU CONQUER YOUR INTERNAL INSTINCTS, YOU WILL BE SUCCESSFUL. 

*SAME WAY, YOU DON’T NEED TO CONQUER THESE 4 FORCES, YOU ONLY NEED TO UNDERSTAND THE INTERNAL IMPACT OF THESE FOUR FORCES ON YOU, IT IS ENOUGH. YOU CAN SEE CLEARLY HOW THESE 4 FORCES ARE MAPPING TO YOUR LAZINESS, SELF DOUBT, SELF HATRED, SELF DENIAL. 

*“PARAMASHIVA PARAMPORUL” - PARAMASHIVA - IS ABSOLUTE SHAKTI. PARAMASHIVA IS ABSOLUTE ENERGY. STRONGLY DECLARE IN YOUR BEING: WHETHER YOU HAVE LAZINESS OR NOT, SELF DOUBT, SELF HATRED, SELF DENIAL OR NOT, YOU ARE PARAMASHIVA BECAUSE THAT IS THE TRUTH. 

*I WANT TO INITIATE ALL OF YOU FIRST BECAUSE TODAY IS THE DAY, THE ENERGY FROM KAILAASA IS LANDING ON PLANET EARTH MARKED BY THE FLAG HOISTING IN THE ARUNACHALESHWARA TEMPLE. LET US RECEIVE PARAMASHIVA’S ENERGY. 

*I WANTED TO EXPLAIN THE ALCHEMISTRY OF ESHWARA SHAKTI. ALL GODS AND GODDESSES ARE DIFFERENT PERMUTATION COMBINATIONS OF THE VARIOUS ESHWARA SHAKTIS. 

*ALL THE GODS WHO MASTERED GRAVITATIONAL FORCE WILL BE CARVED IN THE VIMANA. VIMANA REPRESENTS MASTERING GRAVITATIONAL FORCE. 

*ALL GODS WHO HAVE MASTERED THE ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE WILL BE CARVED ON THE GOPURA. GOPURA IS FOR SENDING POSITIVE ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE TO THE WHOLE CITY. 

*ALL THE GODS IN THE GARBA GRAHA ARE ESHWARA SHAKTI THAT HAVE MASTERED THE WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE

*THE MOOLA DEVATA IS THE ESHWARA SHAKTI THAT HAS MASTERED THE STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE. 

*IF YOU UNDERSTAND ALL THAT I AM SAYING, YOU WILL UNDERSTAND THAT A HINDU TEMPLE IS A SPIRITUAL SCIENCE LABORATORY TO HELP YOU MANIFEST ESHWARA SHAKTI. DON’T LIVE IN A PLACE WHERE THERE IS NO TEMPLE. 

*THERE ARE FOUR THINGS IN A TEMPLE: GOPURA, VIMANA, GARBHA GRAHA, MOOLA DEVATA. IF YOU CONNECT WITH GODS IN GOPURA, YOU WILL RECHARGE THE ESHWARA SHAKTI TO MASTER THE ELECTROMAGNETIC FORCE. THAT IS WHY IN FRONT OF GOPURA, YOU NEED TO LOOK AND UP AND MEDITATE ON EACH DEITY. 

*IF YOU CONNECT WITH THE GODS IN THE VIMANA, YOU WILL MASTER ESHWARA SHAKTI TO MASTER THE GRAVITATIONAL FORCE. 

*IF YOU CONNECT WITH THE GARBHA GRAHA, YOU WILL MANIFEST THE ESHWARA SHAKTI TO MASTER THE WEAK NUCLEAR FORCE. 

*IF YOU CONNECT WITH THE MOOLA DEVATA, YOU WILL MANIFEST THE POWER TO MASTER STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE. 

*TEMPLES ARE SUCH SPIRITUAL POWER CENTERS. AS LONG AS TEMPLES ARE RUNNING PROPERLY, TAMIL NADU CANNOT BE DESTROYED. IT IS EXTRAORDINARY. SUCH LARGE NUMBER OF SPIRITUAL POWER STATIONS, ESHWARA SHAKTITVA. 
WHY DO YOU THINK, EVEN THOUGH SO MANY TAMILIANS HAVE TURNED AGAINST HINDUISM AND BECOME ATHEISTS, WHY DO YOU THINK I TOOK BIRTH IN TAMILNADU? IT IS BECAUSE OF THE POWER OF THE KSHETRA!
